SAK-S6-01.question_id: Siapa pelanggan dengan total nilai pembayaran terbesar? Sertakan nama depan, nama belakang, dan total pembayarannya.
SAK-S6-01.question_en: Who is the customer with the highest total payment amount? Include first name, last name, and total payment.
SAK-S6-01.solution_sql: SELECT c.first_name,c.last_name,SUM(p.amount) AS total_payment FROM customer c JOIN payment p ON c.customer_id=p.customer_id GROUP BY c.customer_id,c.first_name,c.last_name HAVING SUM(p.amount)=(SELECT MAX(tp) FROM (SELECT SUM(amount) AS tp FROM payment GROUP BY customer_id) t);
SAK-S6-01.notes: Tiga kolom: first_name, last_name, total_payment. Jika terdapat beberapa item dengan nilai maksimum yang sama, semua baris tersebut harus muncul.

SAK-S6-02.question_id: Film apa yang memiliki durasi terlama? Sertakan judul dan durasinya.
SAK-S6-02.question_en: Which film has the longest duration? Include title and duration.
SAK-S6-02.solution_sql: SELECT title,length FROM film HAVING length=(SELECT MAX(length) FROM film);
SAK-S6-02.notes: Dua kolom: title dan length. Jika terdapat beberapa item dengan nilai maksimum yang sama, semua baris tersebut harus muncul.

SAK-S6-03.question_id: Kota mana yang memiliki jumlah pelanggan terbanyak? Sertakan nama kota dan jumlah pelanggannya.
SAK-S6-03.question_en: Which city has the most customers? Include city name and customer count.
SAK-S6-03.solution_sql: SELECT ci.city,COUNT(*) AS customer_count FROM customer c JOIN address a ON c.address_id=a.address_id JOIN city ci ON a.city_id=ci.city_id GROUP BY ci.city HAVING COUNT(*)=(SELECT MAX(cnt) FROM (SELECT COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM customer c2 JOIN address a2 ON c2.address_id=a2.address_id JOIN city ci2 ON a2.city_id=ci2.city_id GROUP BY ci2.city) x);
SAK-S6-03.notes: Dua kolom: city dan customer_count. Jika terdapat beberapa item dengan nilai maksimum yang sama, semua baris tersebut harus muncul.

SAK-S6-04.question_id: Siapa pelanggan yang paling sering menyewa film? Sertakan nama depan, nama belakang, dan jumlah sewanya.
SAK-S6-04.question_en: Who is the customer who rents films most frequently? Include first name, last name, and rental count.
SAK-S6-04.solution_sql: SELECT c.first_name,c.last_name,COUNT(r.rental_id) AS rental_count FROM customer c JOIN rental r ON c.customer_id=r.customer_id GROUP BY c.customer_id,c.first_name,c.last_name HAVING COUNT(r.rental_id) = (SELECT MAX(cnt) FROM (SELECT COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM rental GROUP BY customer_id) AS t);
SAK-S6-04.notes: Tiga kolom: first_name, last_name, rental_count. Jika terdapat beberapa item dengan nilai maksimum yang sama, semua baris tersebut harus muncul.

SAK-S6-05.question_id: Pada tahun 2005, bulan apa yang mencatat total pembayaran terbesar? Sertakan nomor bulan (1â€“12) dan total pembayarannya.
SAK-S6-05.question_en: In 2005, which month recorded the highest total payments? Include month number (1-12) and total payment amount.
SAK-S6-05.solution_sql: SELECT MONTH(payment_date) AS month_num,SUM(amount) AS total_payment FROM payment WHERE YEAR(payment_date)=2005 GROUP BY MONTH(payment_date) HAVING SUM(amount)=(SELECT MAX(tp) FROM (SELECT SUM(amount) AS tp FROM payment WHERE YEAR(payment_date)=2005 GROUP BY MONTH(payment_date)) m);
SAK-S6-05.notes: Dua kolom: month_num dan total_payment. Jika terdapat beberapa item dengan nilai maksimum yang sama, semua baris tersebut harus muncul.
